content: प्रसंगः {@--1@} Attachment, devotion, addiction, devotedness; स्वरूपयोग्ये सुरतप्रसंगे <ls>Ku. 1. 19</ls>; तस्यात्यायतकोमलस्य सततं द्यूतप्रसंगेन किं <ls>Mk. 2. 11</ls>; <ls>Śi. 11. 22.</ls> {@--2@} Union, intercourse, association, connection; निवर्ततामस्माद्गणिकाप्रसंगात् <ls>Mk. 4</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 251.</ls> {@--3@} Illicit intercourse. {@--4@} Occupation, intentness, being engaged or occupied with; भ्रूविक्रियां विरतप्रसंगैः <ls>Ku. 3. 47.</ls> {@--5@} A subject or topic (of discourse or controversy). {@--6@} An occasion, incident; दिग्विजयप्रसंगेन <ls>K. 191</ls>; यात्राप्रसंगेन <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--7@} Conjuncture, time, opportunity; <ls>Ms. 9. 5.</ls> {@--8@} A contingency, event, case, occurrence of a possibility; नेश्वरो जगतः कारणमुपपद्यते कुतः वैषम्यनैर्घृण्यप्रसंगात् <ls>Ś. B.</ls>; एवं चानवस्थाप्रसंगः {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; तस्याणुतरप्रसंगात् Tarka k.; <ls>Ku. 7. 16.</ls> {@--9@} Connected reasoning or argument. {@--10@} A conclusion, an inference. {@--11@} Connected language. {@--12@} Inseparable application or connection (= व्याप्ति <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--13@} Mention of parents. {@--14@} Introduction, insertion. {@--15@} Gain. (प्रसंगेन, प्रसंगतः, प्रसंगात् are used adverbially in the sense of {@--1@} in relation to. {@--2@} in consequence of, on account of, because of, by way of. {@--3@} occasionally, incidentally. {@--4@} in course of; as in कथाप्रसंगेन in course of conversation’).
